testcase.classname: Cart and Checkout to validate product details
testcase.name: Verify Products Add to Cart test scenario
testcase.system-out: Given User is on home screen................................................passed Then Verify home page is displayed on the screen............................passed When User tap on "Best sellers" option in home screen.......................passed And User tap on See more Best Sellers in Camera & Photo in best sellers page.passed And User select fifth product in product list page..........................passed And User select "8" product quantity in product details page................passed When User tap on "Add to cart" to add the product in cart...................passed Then Verify product name and total amount is displayed correctly on cart screen.passed
